_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Tuesday February 17, 5:30 a.m. The holiday weekend has wrapped up and the storm has arrived! We picked up 4 inches of fluff overnight. Snowfall continues throughout the week with over 30 inches of snow still in the forecast. Today we are expecting a high of 28 degrees with snowfall all day long. 5 to 9 inches of snowfall is projected before lifts close. Some delays on lifts and terrain are possible today as patrol assesses the mountain and conducts avalanche mitigation work as needed with the new snow. Keep a lookout for icy spots and hidden hazards in areas with thin coverage later in the day. Its Tie Dye Tuesday at The Thirsty Squirrel, so grab a drink and get colorful. Buy a $20 white logo shirt at The Thirsty Squirrel and get the materials and instructions to tie dye your own unique Squirrel shirt. This event is for ages 21+ (I.D. required).
